mn146:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn146:2.1_0: Atha kho mahāpajāpatigotamī pañcamattehi bhikkhunisatehi saddhiṁ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn146:2.1_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho mahāpajāpatigotamī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn146:2.4_0: karotu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhunīnaṁ dhammiṁ kathan”ti.
mn146:3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadanti pariyāyena.
mn146:3.2_0: Āyasmā nandako na icchati bhikkhuniyo ovadituṁ pariyāyena.
mn146:3.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
mn146:3.4_0: “kassa nu kho, ānanda, ajja pariyāyo bhikkhuniyo ovadituṁ pariyāyenā”ti?
mn146:3.5_0: “Sabbeheva, bhante, kato pariyāyo bhikkhuniyo ovadituṁ pariyāyena.
mn146:3.6_0: Ayaṁ, bhante, āyasmā nandako na icchati bhikkhuniyo ovadituṁ pariyāyenā”ti.
mn146:4.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ nandakaṁ āmantesi:
mn146:4.4_0: karohi tvaṁ, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhunīnaṁ dhammiṁ kathan”ti.
mn146:4.5_1: bhante”ti kho āyasmā nandako bhagavato paṭissutvā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
mn146:4.6_0: Sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto attadutiyo yena rājakārāmo tenupasaṅkami.
mn146:4.7_0: Addasaṁsu kho tā bhikkhuniyo āyasmantaṁ nandakaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
mn146:4.8_0: Disvāna āsanaṁ paññāpesuṁ, udakañca pādānaṁ upaṭṭhapesuṁ.
mn146:4.9_0: Nisīdi kho āyasmā nandako paññatte āsane.
mn146:4.11_0: Tāpi kho bhikkhuniyo āyasmantaṁ nandakaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
mn146:4.12_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho tā bhikkhuniyo āyasmā nandako etadavoca:
mn146:5.2_0: Tattha ājānantīhi: ‘ājānāmā’ tissa vacanīyaṁ, na ājānantīhi: ‘na ājānāmā’ tissa vacanīyaṁ.
mn146:5.3_0: Yassā vā panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā ahameva tattha paṭipucchitabbo:
mn146:5.5_0: “Ettakenapi mayaṁ, bhante, ayyassa nandakassa attamanā abhiraddhā yaṁ no ayyo nandako pavāretī”ti.
mn146:6.4_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
mn146:6.6_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
mn146:6.20_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
mn146:6.22_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
mn146:6.26_0: “Pubbeva no etaṁ, bhante, yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṁ:
mn146:6.29_0: Evañhetaṁ, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasāvakassa yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato.
mn146:7.4_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
mn146:7.6_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
mn146:7.20_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
mn146:7.22_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
mn146:7.26_0: “Pubbeva no etaṁ, bhante, yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṁ:
mn146:7.29_0: Evañhetaṁ, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasāvakassa yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato.
mn146:8.4_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
mn146:8.6_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
mn146:8.9_0: “Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhaginiyo, sotaviññāṇaṁ niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā”ti?
mn146:8.19_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vāti”?
mn146:8.21_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
mn146:8.25_0: “Pubbeva no etaṁ, bhante, yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṁ:
mn146:8.28_0: Evañhetaṁ, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasāvakassa yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato.
mn146:9.2_0: Yo nu kho, bhaginiyo, evaṁ vadeyya:
mn146:9.4_0: yā ca khvāssa ābhā sā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā’ti;
mn146:9.5_0: sammā nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?
mn146:9.10_0: “Evameva kho, bhaginiyo, yo nu kho evaṁ vadeyya:
mn146:9.12_0: yañca kho cha ajjhattike āyatane paṭicca paṭisaṁvedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā taṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhamman’ti;
mn146:9.13_0: sammā nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?
mn146:9.16_0: “Tajjaṁ tajjaṁ, bhante, paccayaṁ paṭicca tajjā tajjā vedanā uppajjanti.
mn146:9.17_0: Tajjassa tajjassa paccayassa nirodhā tajjā tajjā vedanā nirujjhantī”ti.
mn146:9.19_0: Evañhetaṁ, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasāvakassa yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato.
mn146:10.1_2: mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato mūlampi aniccaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ,
mn146:10.2_0: Yo nu kho, bhaginiyo, evaṁ vadeyya:
mn146:10.3_0: ‘amussa mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato mūlampi aniccaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ,
mn146:10.3_3: yā ca khvāssa chāyā sā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā’ti;
mn146:10.4_0: sammā nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?
mn146:10.7_1: mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato mūlampi aniccaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ,
mn146:10.9_0: “Evameva kho, bhaginiyo, yo nu kho evaṁ vadeyya:
mn146:10.11_0: Yañca kho cha bāhire āyatane paṭicca paṭisaṁvedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā taṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhamman’ti;
mn146:10.12_0: sammā nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?
mn146:10.15_0: “Tajjaṁ tajjaṁ, bhante, paccayaṁ paṭicca tajjā tajjā vedanā uppajjanti.
mn146:10.16_0: Tajjassa tajjassa paccayassa nirodhā tajjā tajjā vedanā nirujjhantī”ti.
mn146:10.18_0: Evañhetaṁ, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasāvakassa yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato.
mn146:11.1_2: dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā gāviṁ vadhitvā tiṇhena govikantanena gāviṁ saṅkanteyya anupahacca
mn146:11.2_0: Yaṁ yadeva tattha antarā vilimaṁsaṁ antarā nhāru antarā bandhanaṁ taṁ tadeva tiṇhena govikantanena sañchindeyya
mn146:11.3_0: Sañchinditvā saṅkantitvā sampakantitvā samparikantitvā vidhunitvā bāhiraṁ cammakāyaṁ teneva cammena taṁ gāviṁ paṭicchādetvā evaṁ vadeyya:
mn146:11.5_0: sammā nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?
mn146:11.8_1: dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā gāviṁ vadhitvā tiṇhena govikantanena gāviṁ saṅkanteyya anupahacca
mn146:11.9_0: Yaṁ yadeva tattha antarā vilimaṁsaṁ antarā nhāru antarā bandhanaṁ taṁ tadeva tiṇhena govikantanena sañchindeyya
mn146:11.10_0: Sañchinditvā saṅkantitvā sampakantitvā samparikantitvā vidhunitvā bāhiraṁ cammakāyaṁ teneva cammena taṁ gāviṁ paṭicchādetvā kiñcāpi so evaṁ vadeyya:
mn146:11.12_0: atha kho sā gāvī visaṁyuttā teneva cammenā”ti.
mn146:12.1_0: “Upamā kho me ayaṁ, bhaginiyo, katā atthassa viññāpanāya.
mn146:12.3_0: ‘antarā maṁsakāyo’ti kho, bhaginiyo, channetaṁ ajjhattikānaṁ āyatanānaṁ adhivacanaṁ;
mn146:12.4_0: ‘bāhiro cammakāyo’ti kho, bhaginiyo, channetaṁ bāhirānaṁ āyatanānaṁ adhivacanaṁ;
mn146:12.5_0: ‘antarā vilimaṁsaṁ, antarā nhāru, antarā bandhanan’ti kho, bhaginiyo, nandīrāgassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ;
mn146:12.6_0: ‘tiṇhaṁ govikantanan’ti kho, bhaginiyo, ariyāyetaṁ paññāya adhivacanaṁ;
mn146:12.7_0: yāyaṁ ariyā paññā antarā kilesaṁ antarā saṁyojanaṁ antarā bandhanaṁ sañchindati saṅkantati sampakantati samparikantati.
mn146:13.1_3: yesaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme
mn146:13.3_2: bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
mn146:13.9_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
mn146:13.10_3: yesaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme
mn146:14.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā nandako tā bhikkhuniyo iminā ovādena ovaditvā uyyojesi:
mn146:14.3_0: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo āyasmato nandakassa bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā āyasmantaṁ nandakaṁ
mn146:14.3_1: abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
mn146:14.3_3: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhagavā etadavoca:
mn146:14.5_0: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkamiṁsu.
mn146:15.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā acirapakkantīsu tāsu bhikkhunīsu bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn146:15.2_0: “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe cātuddase na hoti bahuno janassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā:
mn146:15.3_0: ‘ūno nu kho cando, puṇṇo nu kho cando’ti, atha kho ūno cando tveva hoti.
mn146:15.4_2: tā bhikkhuniyo nandakassa dhammadesanāya attamanā honti no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappā”ti.
mn146:16.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ nandakaṁ āmantesi:
mn146:16.2_0: “tena hi tvaṁ, nandaka, svepi tā bhikkhuniyo tenevovādena ovadeyyāsī”ti.
mn146:16.3_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā nandako bhagavato paccassosi.
mn146:16.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā nandako tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
mn146:16.5_0: Sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto attadutiyo yena rājakārāmo tenupasaṅkami.
mn146:16.6_0: Addasaṁsu kho tā bhikkhuniyo āyasmantaṁ nandakaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
mn146:16.7_0: Disvāna āsanaṁ paññāpesuṁ, udakañca pādānaṁ upaṭṭhapesuṁ.
mn146:16.8_0: Nisīdi kho āyasmā nandako paññatte āsane.
mn146:16.10_0: Tāpi kho bhikkhuniyo āyasmantaṁ nandakaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
mn146:16.11_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho tā bhikkhuniyo āyasmā nandako etadavoca:
mn146:16.13_0: Tattha ājānantīhi ‘ājānāmā’ tissa vacanīyaṁ, na ājānantīhi ‘na ājānāmā’ tissa vacanīyaṁ.
mn146:16.14_0: Yassā vā panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā, ahameva tattha paṭipucchitabbo:
mn146:16.16_0: “Ettakenapi mayaṁ, bhante, ayyassa nandakassa attamanā abhiraddhā yaṁ no ayyo nandako pavāretī”ti.
mn146:17-18.1_0: “Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhaginiyo, cakkhu niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā”ti?
mn146:17-18.3_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
mn146:17-18.5_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
mn146:17-18.8_0: “Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhaginiyo, sotaṁ niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā”ti?
mn146:17-18.16_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
mn146:17-18.18_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
mn146:17-18.22_0: “Pubbeva no etaṁ, bhante, yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṁ:
mn146:17-18.25_0: Evañhetaṁ, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasāvakassa yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato.
mn146:19-20.1_0: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhaginiyo, rūpā niccā vā aniccā vā”ti?
mn146:19-20.3_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?

mn146:19-20.8_0: “Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhaginiyo, saddā niccā vā aniccā vā”ti?
mn146:19-20.18_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?

mn146:24.9_0: Yaṁ yadeva tattha antarā vilimaṁsaṁ antarā nhāru antarā bandhanaṁ taṁ tadeva tiṇhena govikantanena sañchindeyya
mn146:24.10_0: Sañchinditvā saṅkantitvā sampakantitvā samparikantitvā vidhunitvā bāhiraṁ cammakāyaṁ teneva cammena taṁ gāviṁ paṭicchādetvā kiñcāpi so evaṁ vadeyya:
mn146:24.12_0: atha kho sā gāvī visaṁyuttā teneva cammenā”ti.
mn146:25.1_0: “Upamā kho me ayaṁ, bhaginiyo, katā atthassa viññāpanāya ayamevettha attho.
mn146:25.2_0: ‘Antarā maṁsakāyo’ti kho, bhaginiyo, channetaṁ ajjhattikānaṁ āyatanānaṁ adhivacanaṁ;
mn146:25.3_0: ‘bāhiro cammakāyo’ti kho, bhaginiyo, channetaṁ bāhirānaṁ āyatanānaṁ adhivacanaṁ;
mn146:25.4_0: ‘antarā vilimaṁsaṁ antarā nhāru antarā bandhanan’ti kho, bhaginiyo, nandīrāgassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ;
mn146:25.5_0: ‘tiṇhaṁ govikantanan’ti kho, bhaginiyo, ariyāyetaṁ paññāya adhivacanaṁ;
mn146:25.6_0: yāyaṁ ariyā paññā antarā kilesaṁ antarā saṁyojanaṁ antarā bandhanaṁ sañchindati saṅkantati sampakantati samparikantati.
mn146:26.1_3: yesaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme
mn146:26.3_2: bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
mn146:26.9_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
mn146:26.10_2: satta bojjhaṅgā yesaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ
mn146:26.10_3: diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
mn146:26.11_0: Atha kho āyasmā nandako tā bhikkhuniyo iminā ovādena ovaditvā uyyojesi:
mn146:26.13_0: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo āyasmato nandakassa bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā āyasmantaṁ nandakaṁ
mn146:26.13_1: abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
mn146:26.13_3: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhagavā etadavoca:
mn146:26.15_0: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkamiṁsu.
mn146:27.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā acirapakkantīsu tāsu bhikkhunīsu bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn146:27.2_0: “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe pannarase na hoti bahuno janassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā:
mn146:27.3_0: ‘ūno nu kho cando, puṇṇo nu kho cando’ti, atha kho puṇṇo cando tveva hoti;
mn146:27.4_0: evameva kho, bhikkhave, tā bhikkhuniyo nandakassa dhammadesanāya attamanā ceva paripuṇṇasaṅkappā ca.
mn146:27.5_2: pañcannaṁ bhikkhunisatānaṁ yā pacchimikā bhikkhunī sā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā”ti.
mn146:27.7_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
